Willpower.mechanic: Mana-Hump: You can store 5 extra Focus points for later use.

Knowledge.name: Knowledge Tail
Knowledge.mechanic: Wire-Tail: Use your tail to pick locks remotely (10ft range).

Logic.name: Logic Tail
Logic.mechanic: Tri-Balance: You cannot be knocked prone while your tail touches the floor.

Awareness.name: Awareness Tail
Awareness.mechanic: Blind-Tail: Your tail senses movement behind you; you cannot be Flanked.

Intuition.name: Intuition Tail
Intuition.mechanic: Whip-Crack: Action: Your tail attack (1d4) knocks the enemy 5ft back.

Charm.name: Charm Tail
Charm.mechanic: Tickle-Tail: Tail attack confuses the target for 1 turn.

Willpower.name: Willpower Tail
Willpower.mechanic: Crane-Tail: You can hang from your tail and keep both hands free.

Knowledge.name: Knowledge Toxic
Knowledge.mechanic: Neural-Venom: Poison damage also drains 1 Focus from the target.

Logic.name: Logic Toxic
Logic.mechanic: Quick-Venom: Poison takes effect immediately (No start-of-turn delay).

Awareness.name: Awareness Toxic
Awareness.mechanic: Neuro-Toxic: Poisoned enemies have -2 to hit you.

Intuition.name: Intuition Toxic
Intuition.mechanic: Burn-Venom: Poison deals Acid damage instead of Poison damage.

Charm.name: Charm Toxic
Charm.mechanic: Sweet-Venom: Poisoned enemies are also Charmed toward you.

Willpower.name: Willpower Toxic
Willpower.mechanic: Death-Venom: Poison deals 1d8 damage instead of 1d4.

Knowledge.name: Knowledge Horn
Knowledge.mechanic: Echo-Horn: Bumping horns detects the level of an enemy.

Logic.name: Logic Horn
Logic.mechanic: Point-Horn: Spend 1 SP to gain +2 to hit with your next melee strike.

Awareness.name: Awareness Horn
Awareness.mechanic: Glow-Horn: Your horn lights up when hidden enemies are near (10ft).

Intuition.name: Intuition Horn
Intuition.mechanic: Gore-Vibe: Horn attacks deal double damage to bleeding targets.

Charm.name: Charm Horn
Charm.mechanic: Crown-Horn: Nearby allies get +2 to Resisting Fear.

Willpower.name: Willpower Horn
Willpower.mechanic: Spirit-Horn: Your horn can parry magical projectiles.
